item.description:
please Join us on Monday, June 1, at 7 pm to chat about Stone Butch Blues, by Leslie Feinberg!

We'll be meeting again at Panera in Hadley (just fyi - july and august's meetings are probably at the forbes library community room)

Apologies for posting this to meetup.com so late. We are now almost entirely transitioned over to the *GOOGLE GROUP* which is replacing meetup, and so I forgot to add it here.

If you aren't signed up for the google group yet, send me an email at newbookgroup@gmail.com , or message me via meetup, and I will add you directly!

Hope to see you monday after next : )

ps - book picking so far has been happening via drawing a title from a hat; if you'd like to add your two cents about which books should go in the hat, add yours monday, or if you can't make monday, email me a title you'd like me to add for you.
item.how_to_find_us: we'll probably be in the back
item.name: Stone Butch Blues - June 1
